00037   class tgba_run_dotty_decorator: public dotty_decorator
00038   {
00039   public:
00040     tgba_run_dotty_decorator(const tgba_run* run);
00041     virtual ~tgba_run_dotty_decorator();
00042 
00043     virtual std::string state_decl(const tgba* a, const state* s, int n,
00044                                    tgba_succ_iterator* si,
00045                                    const std::string& label);
00046     virtual std::string link_decl(const tgba* a,
00047                                   const state* in_s, int in,
00048                                   const state* out_s, int out,
00049                                   const tgba_succ_iterator* si,
00050                                   const std::string& label);
00051   private:
00052     const tgba_run* run_;
00053     typedef std::pair<tgba_run::steps::const_iterator, int> step_num;
00054     typedef std::list<step_num> step_set;
00055     typedef std::map<const state*, std::pair<step_set, step_set>,
00056                      spot::state_ptr_less_than> step_map;
00057     step_map map_;
00058   };
